price: E quantos seres animais não carregam seu sustento! Allah lhes dá sustento e a vós. E Ele é O Oniouvinte, O Onisciente.
arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٖ لَّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waka-ayyin min dābbatin lā taḥmilu riz'qahā al-lahu yarzuquhā wa-iyyākum wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
